question: What are the genders of <Harry>, <Hermione>, and <Ron> respectively? A. boy, girl, boy. B. girl, boy, girl.
What are the hair colors of <Harry>, <Hermione>, and <Ron> respectively? A. black, brown, red. B. brown, black, blonde.
Do <Harry> and <Ron> often wear glasses? A. Yes. B. No.
What type of clothing do <Hermione> and <Ron> often wear? A. Casual, Formal. B. Both Casual.
Are all <Harry>, <Hermione>, and <Ron> humans or animals? A. Humans. B. Animals.
